componentDescription: A floating menu that appears upon user interaction, typically a right-click or long-press.

children.description: Defines the content that the ContextMenu will render, typically the element that triggers the context menu.

items.description: An optional array of items to be displayed in the context menu.

size.description: Specifies the predefined size of the context menu.

variant.description: Determines the visual variant or style of the context menu.

disableNativeContextMenu.description: If true, prevents the browser's native context menu from appearing when right-clicking.

onOpenChange.description: Callback function triggered when the open state of the context menu changes.

views.description: Allows for custom styling of different parts of the context menu component. This includes container, menu, content, item, activeItem, divider, separator, icon, submenuIndicator, and submenu styles.

triggerChildren.description: The element that serves as the trigger for opening the context menu.

triggerDisableNativeContextMenu.description: If true, disables the default browser context menu for the trigger element.

asChild.description: When true, the trigger will render its child as-is, passing props to it.

isDisabled.description: If true, the context menu trigger will be visually and functionally disabled.

triggerViews.description: Custom styles for various sub-elements of the ContextMenuTrigger, specifically for the trigger's container.

contentItems.description: An optional array of items to render within the context menu content.

contentChildren.description: Content to be rendered inside the context menu, typically ContextMenuItem or ContextMenuSeparator components.

position.description: Explicitly sets the x and y coordinates for positioning the context menu.

side.description: Specifies the preferred side where the context menu content will open relative to its trigger.

align.description: Determines the alignment of the context menu content relative to the trigger along the specified side.

contentViews.type: { menu?: ViewProps; content?: ViewProps; item?: ViewProps; divider?: ViewProps; separator?: ViewProps; icon?: ViewProps; submenuIndicator?: ViewProps; }
contentViews.description: Custom styles for various sub-elements of the ContextMenuContent, including the main menu container, overall content wrapper, individual context menu items, visual divider, separator element, icons within menu items, and the submenu indicator icon.

item.description: The data object for the individual context menu item.

itemChildren.description: Content to be rendered inside the menu item, typically text or an icon.

onSelect.description: Callback function invoked when the menu item is selected or clicked.

itemIsDisabled.description: If true, the menu item will be visually and functionally disabled.

itemViews.type: { item?: ViewProps; icon?: ViewProps; submenuIndicator?: ViewProps; }
itemViews.description: Custom styles for various sub-elements of the ContextMenuItem, including the individual menu item container, icon within the menu item, and the submenu indicator icon.

dividerViews.description: Custom styles for various sub-elements of the ContextMenuDivider, specifically for the divider element itself.

separatorViews.description: Custom styles for various sub-elements of the ContextMenuSeparator, specifically for the separator element itself.
